thread.title: SANTHOSH KRISHNAN SUNDARAN
thread.title_full: Energia reviewed by SANTHOSH KRISHNAN SUNDARAN

author: SANTHOSH KRISHNAN SUNDARAN
title: SANTHOSH KRISHNAN SUNDARAN
text: After moving into Ireland in 2016 , I've no idea whom to choose as energy provider. With absolutely no knowledge on any of them like gas , electricity (switching providers , billing ) etc etc. i called up energia and they just took care of the rest from the day one. Very competitive in the market and hassle free for customers. Thanks..!!
